column5: DROPPED THE LITTLE GUY OFF AT SCHOOL TODAY AND DECIDED TO HIT A TRIB!! WATERS WERE PRETTY DARN GOOD TO MY SURPRISE. FISHED FROM 8 TILL 11 AND DID PRETTY WELL. LOADS OF SUCKERS AROUND THOUGH.  NICE MALE   NICE LITTLE HEN   AND ABOUT A DOZ OF THESE COOKIE CUTTERS  LOL
Nice pics.  Glad to hear the chromes were cooperative today.  Thanks for sharing,  reefrunner
HOOVERS.Never heard that one before. NICE STEELS CC.
Great stuff Scott!  The waters there looked surprisingly in good shape!
Just call the suckers whistling trout.
Good going CC glad to see you are catching fish!!
perfect time to run sucker spawn imitations...... one of my flies i love using  when the suckers are in...
Ok Im confussed Niagara. I thought the suckers ate the trout roe,not the other way around ? Nice tye btw.
You always hit 'em CC.  Keep the reports coming man.
Nice , One more 24 hr shift and than 5 days of chrome searching!!!! RF

nice job bud....I was pretty much packing up the pin until opener...figured most bigger fish moved up with the last two big floods....what a difference in fight with the water temps coming up in the last two weeks, AY !!!!! I got out thursday for a couple hours and got in to one of those 2lb cookie cutters...couldn't believe the fight it put up...Then I remembered that all the chrome in the last month were coming out of subzero temp's......can't wait for the ackrobats on the opener !!!
TX ALL YA PRETTY MUCH 99% OF THE RUN IS UP!!! JUST PRETTY MUCH STRAGGLERS NOW!!! BUT WITH THAT 1% YA KNOW I'LL STILL BE OUT THERE   LOL

no the trout eat sucker spawn as well..   it's a steelie  revenge i guess  lol on the niagara when steel gets close to spawning this sucker spawn pattern turns them right on.... if it works... DO  IT        giver a try   you'll love the results..
Great job CC...They're small but they're still so beautiful.  Hopefully I'll be able to get out this week.  After 7months of not fishing, suckers don't seem all that bad.
nice stuff, if that's 1%, 2% must be a riot
